CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 31, 1957, pg. 23, reads: "Gay Group At Barbecue - The McEnheimer barbecue held on both levels of their hillside home on Lincoln Ave., drew this gay group to the barbecue pit. Wielding the tools of the trade is Mrs. McEnheimer.  In group is Bob McEnheimer, second from right, whose annual gatherings aimed at personnel of his insurance company, and close friends, are constantly gala affairs.  Also shown are 'Chef' Gordon Brown and his 'assistant,' Norman Hardy; Bali Schalk Early of Detroit, and Mrs. Mary Twisdale of Philadelphia, Mary's cousin among others. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Mrs. McEnheimer holding tools in front of barbecue, Bob McEnheimer second from right, Gordon Brown, Norman Hardy, Bali Schalk Early holding sunglasses, and Mary Twisdale, in McEnheimer yard, Lincoln Avenue
